messages.message: Heads-up that the Prod Jenkins web UI is going to be unavailable for a few minutes as I push a proper fix for the ingress rollback issue we've been seeing. I'll post here when it's back and happy :+1:
Running into some odd DNS behavior, investigating

:white_check_mark: Should be all good now, there was a mismatch between `external-dns` and the desired changes. Fix is merged, there should be NO MORE random reversions. :joy:

https://prod.jenkins.instabase.com/ is up and happy

CC: @jtau @derrick.smith <!subteam^S08AA13VAFQ>
